subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Johan Santana set a franchise record with 17 strikeouts in eight innings yesterday to lead the host Minnesota Twins past the Texas Rangers, 1-0. The Twins have scored only four runs in their past five games at the Metrodome, three of them wins.
